resources.string: The user does not have administrator privileges.
Enter your password or access pin
Your PIN has sent an email.
Number of records (records are calculated by the number of employees who record at least one punch per day).
"For your security, we will pre-authorize a charge of up to $1.00 USD on your card. Don't worry, it's just a verification and the money won't be debited from your account."
There are pending purchases to process. Do you want to send the pending purchases?
Are you sure you don t want to send the pending purchases?
Your purchase is being processed, as soon as the purchase service is reestablished, your data will be recorded
"Please enter the number of the employee you wish to enroll or modify."
Please enter the number of the employee you wish to enroll or modify.
You have %1$d days left. update your account
You have %1$d day left. update your account.
We inform you that your Human eTime Free Trail account has expired. If you want to continue with the benefits of the application, we recommend that you make the payment now.
You can only set 1 zone at most. If you want to add more, upgrade your Trial version to Enterprise.
You can only set 5 stations at most. If you want to add more, upgrade your Trial version to Enterprise.
You can only set up 1 supervisor at most. If you want to add more, upgrade your Trial version to Enterprise.
You can only set up 10 employees at most. If you want to add more, upgrade your Trial version to Enterprise.
We remind you that today %1$s is your payment deadline.
We remind you that the date of your next %1$s bill is due on %2$s.
We inform you that your Human eTime Entreprise account has expired. If you want to continue with the benefits of the application, we recommend that you make the payment now.
We inform you that your Human eTime Entreprise account has expired. If you want to continue with the benefits of the application, we recommend that you make the payment now.
If you have any questions about how to make the payment, write to us at contacto@venturessoft.com
We inform you that your trial version expires in 7 days. If you wish, you can activate your Enterprise Subscription now \uF04A (happy face)
We are sad because today your trial version ends \uF04C (sad face) \n Do you want the Enterprise version? Access the app and subscribe. \uF04A (smiling face)
The upgrade of your subscription to Enterprise was successful.
To apply the changes it is necessary to Login again
You are about to enjoy all the benefits of our app for all your collaborators.\n\nPlease confirm the following information:
Your Free Trial subscription will expire on %1$s
Upgrade your account to Enterprise and enjoy the following benefits:
Registration of entries and exits of your collaborators from their unlimited cell phone.
Configuration of collaborators according to the number that exists in your organization.
Artificial Intelligence (AI) for face and voice recognition and ensuring the identity of the person.
Location of your collaborators from any point.
Your Free Trial subscription will end on %1$s
Manual renewal, cancel whenever you want
The cost per collaborator is $%1$s MXN
Indicate the number of collaborators you want to assign for this month.
Enjoy the advantages of our app to record the attendance of your staff.
Afterwards, the cost will be $100,000 MXN for your staff of 100,000 collaborators
In 15 days you will enjoy at no cost:
Registration of entries and exits of your collaborators from their cell phone
Artificial Intelligence (AI) for face and voice recognition and ensuring the identity of the person.
Location of your collaborators from any point
Likewise, you will have access to:
Manual renewal, cancel whenever you want
If you want to add either one or more collaborators, as well as stations, you will need to upgrade your Trial version to Human eTime Enterprise
Your Free Trial subscription will expire on %1$s
We remind you that you are in a trial period, so you can only configure:
If you want to add either one or more collaborators, as well as stations, you will need to upgrade your Trial version to Human eTime Enterprise
Manual renewal, cancel whenever you want
We remind you that today %1$s ends your Free Trial. Update your account.
An update has just been downloaded.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
You do not have administrator permissions.
"You need to have location services activated."
Place your face inside the oval, take a picture and wait a few seconds.
"This application needs camera permissions for correct operation."
This application needs location permissions for correct operation.
The employee s photo was stored correctly.
"Are you sure you want to sign out?"
The Human eTime service is not available, please report it to the supervisor.
Your device lost connection to the server, please try again.
A service error has occurred, please try again.
"The profile picture could not be retrieved, please try again."
You do not have an assigned profile picture, report it to your supervisor.
The data associated with the user is not found, try again.
A valid face was not detected, try again.
The face does not match your photo. Please try again.
An error has occurred in the system, please contact the supplier.
User without assigned station, please report it to your supervisor.
Please enter the name of the company
Please enter a federal taxpayer registry

Check in and check out reports
Your password has been sent to your email
I authorize the deletion process of my account.

It makes us sad to know that you no longer wish to continue using Human eTime 😢.

If we can do something to support you so that you do not stop using the product, please send us a message to contacto@venturessoft.com< /font> and we will attend to your case as soon as possible
Once your account is deleted, after 5 days you will no longer have access to your data.
